item.title: MIS522 Case Study 2 - Management's Role in Information Security in a Cyber Economy
item.author: Henry Brooks
item.description:
Week 4 Case Study

Management’s Role in Information Security in a Cyber Economy

This weeks case study examines an article from the California Management Review concerning the role of management in the cyber security stance of an organization.

item.title: SQL queries in Prolog
item.author: Henry Brooks
item.description:
This post will be looking at solving SQL problems with Prolog.

I have been intrigued by Prolog for a while now because of its roots in first-order logic. I have been going through tutorials and examples looking for a way to leverage logic programming as a DSL in personal projects. I feel that Prolog could be used as a substitute for a more fully featured database languages in small projects.

More…

item.title: MIS522 Case Study 1 - With Big Data Comes Big Responsibility
item.author: Henry Brooks
item.description:
Week 2 Case Study

With Big Data Comes Big Responsibility

This weeks case study examines an article from the Harvard Business Review concerning the current and future usage of smart devices and the collection of personal data. I will be using Self-determination theory (SDT) as a lens to view this topic.
